dmca.title: Copyright Problem
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Fireball0236 [mailto:fireball0236@runehq.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 01, 2005 11:44 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Problem



To Whom It May Concern,

I am writing to you to avail myself of my rights under the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).
